meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>ground</kanji> <kanji>star</kanji> is <vocabulary>Saturn</vocabulary>. That's why it's called "sat"urn. Because the first people to find it sat on the ground there. It's a star made completely of sit-on-able ground.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
